verses.text: \w Praise|strong="H1984"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*!\f + \fr 148:1 \ft Hebrew: יה Yah\f* \w Praise|strong="H1984"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*\f + \fr 148:1 \ft LORD or GOD in all caps is from the Hebrew יהוה Yahweh except when otherwise noted as being from the short form יה Yah.\f* \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w heavens|strong="H8064"\w*! \w Praise|strong="H1984"\w* \w him|strong="H4480"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w heights|strong="H4791"\w*!

\w Praise|strong="H1984"\w* \w him|strong="H3605"\w*, \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w angels|strong="H4397"\w*! \w Praise|strong="H1984"\w* \w him|strong="H3605"\w*, \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w army|strong="H6635"\w*!

\w Praise|strong="H1984"\w* \w him|strong="H3605"\w*, \w sun|strong="H8121"\w* \w and|strong="H8121"\w* \w moon|strong="H3394"\w*! \w Praise|strong="H1984"\w* \w him|strong="H3605"\w*, \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w you|strong="H3605"\w* shining \w stars|strong="H3556"\w*!

\w Praise|strong="H1984"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w*, \w you|strong="H5921"\w* \w heavens|strong="H8064"\w* \w of|strong="H4325"\w* \w heavens|strong="H8064"\w*, \w you|strong="H5921"\w* \w waters|strong="H4325"\w* \w that|strong="H4325"\w* \w are|strong="H8064"\w* \w above|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w heavens|strong="H8064"\w*.

Let \w them|strong="H6680"\w* \w praise|strong="H1984"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*’s \w name|strong="H8034"\w*, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w were|strong="H3068"\w* \w created|strong="H1254"\w*.

\w He|strong="H5414"\w* \w has|strong="H5414"\w* also \w established|strong="H5975"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w* \w forever|strong="H5769"\w* \w and|strong="H5769"\w* \w ever|strong="H5769"\w*. \w He|strong="H5414"\w* \w has|strong="H5414"\w* \w made|strong="H5414"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w decree|strong="H2706"\w* \w which|strong="H2706"\w* \w will|strong="H5414"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w pass|strong="H5674"\w* \w away|strong="H5674"\w*.

\w Praise|strong="H1984"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* earth, \w you|strong="H3605"\w* great \w sea|strong="H8577"\w* creatures, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w depths|strong="H8415"\w*,

lightning \w and|strong="H6213"\w* \w hail|strong="H1259"\w*, \w snow|strong="H7950"\w* \w and|strong="H6213"\w* \w clouds|strong="H7008"\w*, \w stormy|strong="H5591"\w* \w wind|strong="H7307"\w*, \w fulfilling|strong="H6213"\w* \w his|strong="H6213"\w* \w word|strong="H1697"\w*,

\w mountains|strong="H2022"\w* \w and|strong="H6086"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w hills|strong="H1389"\w*, \w fruit|strong="H6529"\w* \w trees|strong="H6086"\w* \w and|strong="H6086"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* cedars,

wild \w animals|strong="H2416"\w* \w and|strong="H3671"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* livestock, small \w creatures|strong="H2416"\w* \w and|strong="H3671"\w* \w flying|strong="H3671"\w* \w birds|strong="H6833"\w*,

\w kings|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* earth \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w peoples|strong="H3816"\w*, \w princes|strong="H8269"\w* \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w judges|strong="H8199"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* earth,

\w both|strong="H1571"\w* \w young|strong="H5288"\w* \w men|strong="H5288"\w* \w and|strong="H5288"\w* \w maidens|strong="H1330"\w*, \w old|strong="H2205"\w* \w men|strong="H5288"\w* \w and|strong="H5288"\w* \w children|strong="H5288"\w*.

Let \w them|strong="H5921"\w* \w praise|strong="H1984"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*’s \w name|strong="H8034"\w*, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \w alone|strong="H8034"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w exalted|strong="H7682"\w*. \w His|strong="H3068"\w* \w glory|strong="H1984"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w above|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w earth|strong="H8064"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w heavens|strong="H8064"\w*.

\w He|strong="H3605"\w* \w has|strong="H3478"\w* \w lifted|strong="H7311"\w* \w up|strong="H7311"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w horn|strong="H7161"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w praise|strong="H1984"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w saints|strong="H2623"\w*, even \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w near|strong="H7138"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w him|strong="H3605"\w*. \w Praise|strong="H1984"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*!\f + \fr 148:14 \ft Hebrew: יה Yah\f*
